testimonials.text: I recruited Simon as a Systems Support Engineer at Quantel, and he rapidly became a highly valuable member of the team. Very hardworking and flexible, committed, and keen on learning new technologies. A good and popular engineer both internally and with customers. Very good industry knowledge and technical experience - highly recommended!
testimonials.user: James Kellar, Senior Director, Engineering Acceleration at Inmarsat

testimonials.text: Simon is one of those guys that I can absolutely depend on to get the job done, whatever it takes, and I'm speaking from some tough experiences. He is completely focused on achieving the best result and I would be totally glad to work with him again. I cant recommend him highly enough.
testimonials.user: Colin MacPhail, Project Manager at Arqiva

testimonials.text: Simon joined EML early in the project and soon became an integral and important part of the team. His knowledge and committment to getting the software working for the areas under his control was of a high standard. His Army training and direct and concentrated approach meant issues were resolved quickly and efficiently. I liked working with Simon, he is easy to get on with and puts anyone who come into contact with him at their ease, plus his humour was ever evident and this made the project a much happier group to be with especially away from base. I have no hesitation in recommending Simon since he will be a very good asset to any project. He is articulate and speaks with authority on software and hardware systems and has good customer facing skills. I really do hope I can work again with him in the near future.
testimonials.user: Andrew Pearce, Project Design Engineer at VOLANT MEDIA UK LTD

testimonials.text: I Managed Simon as a Systems Support Engineer at Quantel. Simon's industry knowledge and technical experience is second to none. I have worked with Simon both in the factory and on Customer site and when the pressure is really on Simon has a fantastic ability to remain calm and focussed which gives a high level of confidence to the customer. He has a great ability to analyse the most technical of issues and either resolve them himself or provide highly detailed reports back to R&D which in turn provides a fast turn around for the customer. Simon is extremely professional and knowledgeable which is why he is highly recommended by me
